Package es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AIAlgorithm
    An interface for Artificial Intelligence algorithms that are used by automatic players to automatically decide the next (best) move, e.g., MinMax.
    Board
    An interface that represents a board in a board game (e.g., Tic-Tac-Toe).
    GameObserver
    An observer for games.
    GameRules
    Interface that represents the rules of a game.
    Observable<T>
    Generic interface for the Observable pattern.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicBoard
    An abstract board that implements the piece-count mechanism of the interface Board.
    FiniteRectBoard
    An implementation of a finite rectangular board.
    Game
    A class that represents a board game being played.
    GameMove
    An abstract class representing a game move.
    Pair<A,B>
    A generic class for representing a pair of values.
    Piece
    This class represents a game piece (counter) that players can use to place on a board.
    ReadOnlyBoard
    A read only version of a Board.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Game.State
    The possible states of a game.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GameError
    This class, that extends RuntimeException, is used to throw exceptions that are detected while playing the game.
